Reviews.Title: “Would stay again”

Reviews.Content: stayed weekend hotel girls weekend shopping trip checked 500 following day outlets service wonderful nice clean slept front desk employees suggested nearby restaurant offered shuttle didnt drive card called ready head hotel friendly employees location shopping near highland park village shops definitely recommend didnt eat restaurant grabbed drink bar service

Reviews.Title: “Not what we expected!”

Reviews.Content: stayed courtyard marriott hotels husband chose hotel recent trip dallas attended workshop nearby hotel close conveniently located downtown clean bed comfortable exceptional space bureau refrigerator none breakfast complimentary bistro staff courteous especially bistro wifi available fast probably stay check

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again”
Reviews.Author: ResearcherMD
Reviews.Content: excellent wedding party rate stayed property fine jumped exceptional nice bistro lobby coffee morning free wifi decent toiletries parking free getting downtown dallas breeze access interstates 30 35 75 bistro lobby snacks meals restaurant walk recommend driving oak lawn sandwiches etc

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and Superb Staff!!”
Reviews.Author: AdityaGarg
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel month safely excellent hotels near dallas downtown top courteous staff easily spoilt choices available breakfast amenities property clean easily accessible

Reviews.Title: “Great little escape near downtown”
Reviews.Author: ladybug2056
Reviews.Content: stayed town cowboys game market center desireable hotel diamond rough deal enjoyed balcony view dallas skyline able walk dennys breakfast enjoyed cocktails nights patio pool patio looked nice outdoor fire pit complaint housekeeper clean 5pm luckily affect plans suprised id definitely recommend staying fairfield inn door

Reviews.Title: “Nice quiet hotel wish we had more time there...”

Reviews.Content: pros nice location alongside highway blocks downtown dallas bistro located lobby gym pool sauna looked nice didnt time enjoy surprisingly quiet location house cons service guess cant lazy shouldnt count transients safe

Reviews.Title: “Best Courtyard I have ever stayed in.”
Reviews.Author: ericsf
Reviews.Content: dont believe bad reviews herethis time staying courtyard excellent courtyard probably courtyards stayed newly renovated flat screen tvs spotless pool brand outdoor furniture sofas nice fire pit lobby courtyard design absolutely love counter delicious food hotels neighborhood book

Reviews.Title: “Reviews are wrong, this place is great!”
Reviews.Author: kjwzoom
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nov found clean super efficient centrally located value checkin breeze staff warm cheerful giving choice clean spacious hotel underwent huge renovation lobby kingbed bed super comfortable clean ac unit functioned icecold free wireless internet plus shower pressure excellent hotel offers business center bistro breakfast dinner food reasonable rates pool whirlpool dallas function hotel staff feel welcome evenings outside downtown quiet close cheap cab american airlines center whatever hotel fantastic staff amenities deserving bad reviews stay disappointment sales manager terry treat thanks marriott

Reviews.Title: “Urine stained beds”
Reviews.Author: Dancynn
Reviews.Content: carpet mattresses filthy smelled urine newly renovated refers carpet management horrible smokers welcome chain smoker enjoy smell urine management ashamed themselves am gold checked seeing mattresses 10 bugs ick
